name: One Endless Night (Demo)
description:
Play as Male or Female in this short story of an "Apothecary". 

On a quest to do right in this fantasy world, by saving a boys life.

I've been working on this for a while and just wanted to share my progress. The background art was partially made in PS4 Dreams. Don't know if I'll continue it or not for now, if I do it will probably be branching with romantic routes.
